name: Legend of William Shankspear
description:
This was a solo effort "completed" in about 10 hours for the Motor City Game Jam.

Theme was "direct to video 80's action movie".

Special thanks to my wife who tackled most of my sons graduation party logistics over this week end to free up the few hours I did have to work on this.

Game Engine used: Unity

Music created using the http://tones.wolfram.com app.

3d Models and animations created via the Mixamo app (https://www.mixamo.com)
